jx.jx_en_mean: the audience at a theatre, cinema, or other entertainment, viewed as a source of income

phrase.cizu_name: give someone (或 get) the bum's rush

jx.jx_en_mean: (chiefly N. Amer.)forcibly eject someone (or be forcibly ejected) from a place or gathering
Living as a vagrant or a tramp.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English : of unknown origin

entry.def: Someone's bum is the part of their body which they sit on.
A bum is a person who has no permanent home or job and who gets money by working occasionally or by asking people for money.
If someone refers to another person as a bum, they think that person is worthless or irresponsible.

example.ex: You're all a bunch of bums.

entry.def: Some people use bum to describe a situation that they find unpleasant or annoying.

example.ex: He knows you're getting a bum deal.
example.tran: 他知道你在做一笔烂生意。

entry.def: If you bum something off someone, you ask them for it and they give it to you.

example.ex: Mind if I bum a cigarette?

entry.def: If you bum around, you go from place to place without any particular destination, either for enjoyment or because you have nothing else to do.

example.ex: I think they're just bumming around at the moment, not doing a lot...
example.tran: 我想他们目前只是在四处闲逛，没做多少事。

example.ex: She went off to bum round the world with a boyfriend.
example.tran: 她动身和一个男友去周游世界了。

entry.def: If the organizers of an event such as a concert want to put bums on seats, they want a lot of people to attend it.

example.ex: He is one of the few players who puts bums on seats.
example.tran: 他是少数几个知道招揽观众的演员之一。

means.word_mean: 1. a person who is deemed to be despicable or contemptible;

sentences.sentence: "the British call a contemptible person a `git'"
"he tried to help the really down-and-out bums"

means.word_mean: 4. the fleshy part of the human body that you sit on;

sentences.sentence: "he deserves a good kick in the butt"
"are you going to sit on your fanny and do nothing?"

means.word_mean: 1. ask for and get free; be a parasite

sentences.sentence: "Her son is just bumming around all day"

example.en: The kids are out on a bum at some school-sponsored dancing party.
example.zh: 小伙子们都出去参加学校主办的舞会，在狂欢作乐呐。

auth_sentence.content: Not a tune you can hum, that goes bum-bum-di-dum .
auth_sentence.res_content: Not a tune you can hum, that goes bum-bum-di-dum .
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Not a tune you can hum, that goes bum-bum-di-dum .

auth_sentence.content: One colleague ended up in Downpatrick after a bum steer.
auth_sentence.res_content: One colleague ended up in Downpatrick after a bum steer.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: One colleague ended up in Downpatrick after a bum steer.

auth_sentence.content: The bum noticed and asked him what he was worried about.
auth_sentence.res_content: The bum noticed and asked him what he was worried about.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The bum noticed and asked him what he was worried about.

sentences.en: A man pinched her bum on the train so she hit him.
sentences.cn: 在火车上有人捏她屁股，她打了那人。

means.word_mean: 漂泊乞讨的生涯, 游荡生活

sentences.en: John lost his job and went on the bum.
sentences.cn: 约翰失业后过着流浪生活。

sentences.en: He dropped out of college and became a beach bum.
sentences.cn: 他从大学退学，整天在海滩闲逛。

means.word_mean: 懒鬼, 寄生虫, 无赖,懒汉,游手好闲者

sentences.en: Why don’t you stop behaving like a bum and get this place cleaned up?
sentences.cn: 你不要再像一个懒鬼的样子，赶紧把这地方收拾一下好吗？

means.word_mean: 错误的消息(或指点)；无用的信息(或建议)

sentences.en: Whoever recommended this software gave you a bum steer, I’m afraid.
sentences.cn: 恐怕不管是谁推荐的这个软件给你的指点都是错误的。

sentences.en: The reporter was given the bum’s rush out of the club.
sentences.cn: 记者被驱逐离开俱乐部。

sentences.en: I got the bum’s rush from Smith & Co.
sentences.cn: 我被史密斯公司炒了鱿鱼。

sentences.en: He tried to bum a ride.
sentences.cn: 他试图求别人让他搭顺风车。

sentences.en: Can I bum a cigarette off you?
I’ve been bumming around for the last year without a job.
sentences.cn: 我已经闲荡了一年,一直没有活干。

sentences.en: I was really bummed out that there were no tickets left.
